structure.unit: TITLE TO PROPERTY AND RESTRICTIONS ON USE, OWNERSHIP, AND ALIENATION

law.catch_line: Copies of inquest -- Fees of sheriff.
law.text: The clerk shall make out two (2) copies of the inquest, and deliver one (1) to each party on request. The party demanding the inquest shall pay to the sheriff, for his services, four dollars ($4), which shall be taxed in the bill of costs against the adverse party, if the court gives judgment for any amount against him.
law.history: Amended 1976 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 14, sec. 306, effective January 2, 1978. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 3735.
